title: USA Pickleball and Pickleball Instruments to Launch Paddle Field-Testing Program at Golden Ticket Events
excerpt: USA Pickleball and Pickleball Instruments are set to launch a groundbreaking paddle field-testing program designed to bring professional-level equipment verification to amateur com...
content: USA Pickleball and Pickleball Instruments are set to launch a groundbreaking paddle field-testing program designed to bring professional-level equipment verification to amateur competition, beginning with the 2026 Golden Ticket Tournament in Glendale, Arizona.
